AUTHOR: El Laggron
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for downloading this message cog! The commands are default accessible by everyone. If you want to change that, you should use the permissions cog. If you need a quick guide, check this https://github.com/retke/Laggrons-Dumb-Cogs#say If you have any bug, question of suggestion, join my cog support server! https://discord.gg/WsTGeQM
NAME: say
SHORT: Allows you to make your bot say or upload something
DESCRIPTION: This cog will allow you to make your bot say your message, with auto-deletion of the command message, channel argument, DM or even file upload, like gif or png
